thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com | 3 of 330
thread.title: Jo
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Jo

author: Jo
title: Jo
text:
They are always knowledgeable and courteous.
Helps me with what I need,sends samples when I'm in doubt of a product..\
I use to have to buy my products for my husband at Sams, Walmart, Etc and would need to buy 3 or 4 different products before finding the proper fit..Then have to drag it all home.
Northshore sends me what I need and has automatic shipment delivered to my door step So I never run out. Love it Thanks Northshore
